name: riddle_0
description: Riddle 1 of 12: Give me food, and I will live. Give me water, and I will die. What am I?

name: riddle_1
description: Riddle 2 of 12: What is full of holes, but can still hold water?

name: riddle_2
description: Riddle 3 of 12: A farmer has 17 sheep, all but nine die. How many are left?

name: riddle_3
description: Riddle 4 of 12: Mike is a butcher. He is 5’10” tall. What does he weigh?

name: riddle_4
description: Riddle 5 of 12: John needs 13 bottles of water from the store. John can only carry 3 at a time. What's the minimum number of trips John needs to make to the store?

name: riddle_5
description: Riddle 6 of 12: Finger is to Hand, as Leaf is to:

name: riddle_6
description: Riddle 7 of 12: Mary, who is 16 years old, is 4 times as old as her brother. How old will Mary be, when she is twice as old as her brother?

name: riddle_7
description: Riddle 8 of 12: Which one of the 5 is least like the other 4 - Dog, Mouse, Lion, Snake, Elephant?

name: riddle_8
description: Riddle 9 of 12: Book is to Reading as Fork is to:

name: riddle_9
description: Riddle 10 of 12: Forest is to tree as tree is to:

name: riddle_10
description: Riddle 11 of 12: At a conference, 12 members shook hands with each other before & after the meeting. How many total number of hand shakes occurred?

name: riddle_11
description: Riddle 12 of 12: What has a mouth, but cannot eat. Moves, but has no legs. Has a bank, but cannot put money in it?
